section.name: Introduction
section.p:
This document describes the configuration files used by JK on the Tomcat and Web Server side for the impatients:
workers.properties is used on the webserver side. For the Apache servers the default path is in the ServerRoot/conf directory.
WebServers add-ons to be set on the webserver side.
We'll give here minimum servers configuration and an example workers.properties to be able to install and check quickly your configuration.

section.name: Minimum Apache WebServer configuration
section.p: You should first have mod_jk.so (unix) or mod_jk.dll (Windows) installed in your Apache module directory (see your Apache documentation to locate it).

Usual locations on Windows :
C:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache\modules\
C:\Program Files\Apache Group\Apache2\modules
Here is the minimum which should be set in httpd.conf directly or included from another file, the default path is in the ServerRoot/conf directory.
